body_html:
This is an old post but I had this same issue 8/2018 with conda environments and tensorflow (SE led me here). Maybe this will help someone else:

Although in the conda environment as seen in the picture. And tensorflow being installed in the conda environment. I had to execute the python from the environment folder in order for python to recognize tensorflow.

This is hobby work for me so I cannot verify why this is.

body:
This is an old post but I had this same issue 8/2018 with conda environments and tensorflow (SE led me here). Maybe this will help someone else:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7524999/44933291-28d5c800-ad2e-11e8-9b67-e4ae013214e5.png)

Although in the conda environment as seen in the picture. And tensorflow being installed in the conda environment. I had to execute the python from the environment folder in order for python to recognize tensorflow. 

This is hobby work for me so I cannot verify why this is.
